scripts.release:prepare-revision: git flow release start `npm run version:next-revision | tail -n1`; npm run version:increment-revision
scripts.release:prepare-minor: git flow release start `npm run version:next-minor | tail -n1`; npm run version:increment-minor
scripts.release:prepare-major: git flow release start `npm run version:next-major | tail -n1`; npm run version:increment-major
scripts.release:finish: git flow release finish; git push --tags
scripts.version:increment-revision: awk -F'.' '{printf("%d.%d.%d\n",$1,$2,$3+1)}' version > version.bak; rm version; mv version.bak version; git add version; git commit -m "RELEASE(revision)"
scripts.version:increment-minor: awk -F'.' '{printf("%d.%d.%d\n",$1,$2+1,$3)}' version > version.bak; rm version; mv version.bak version; git commit -m "RELEASE(minor)"
scripts.version:increment-major: awk -F'.' '{printf("%d.%d.%d\n",$1+1,$2,$3)}' version > version.bak; rm version; mv version.bak version; git commit -m "RELEASE(major)"
